ad_text: Todays Healthcare Jobs Sponsored Talent Tuesdays, Walk-in Job Fair, 2/7, 3-5 PM, Healthcare, Beaver Dam Marshfield Medical Center Beaver Dam 707 S University Ave., Beaver Dam, WI 53916 Stop in and talk with HR Representatives Connect with Hiring Managers No appointment necessary Positions range from Clinical to Non-Clinical, Entry-level to management and much more! ••• Featured positions may be eligible for a sign on bonus ••• Ask recruiter for details! • Certified Nursing Assistant (CNA) (LTC or CBRF – ALL Shifts) • Registered Nurse (LTC – ALL Shifts) • Resident Assistant (LTC or CBRF – ALL Shifts) • Registered Nurse - Acute (Med/Surg) • Registered Nurse - Acute (ER) • Lead Teacher Learn more or apply at: https://www.marshfieldclinic.org/careers At Marshfield Clinic Health System, we are fully committed to addressing health equity, diversity and inclusion for our employees and providers, our patients, and the communities we serve. We believe that any individual or group should feel welcomed, respected, and valued. View our Equity and Inclusion Statement here: https://www.marshfieldclinic.org/about-us/hedi Marshfield Clinic Health System is an Equal Opportunity/Affirmative Action employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to sex, gender identity, sexual orientation, race, color, religion, national origin, disability, veteran status, age, or any other characteristic protected by law. Todays Healthcare Jobs Sponsored SHP Consumer Sales Associate (Remote) – Serve as a liaison between individual members, broker-partners and Security Health Plan. Position will work remotely (limited to certain states – see career center posting for more information). High school degree or equivalent. Completion of courses in sales, business, insurance or related field. Minimum one year in health insurance/ health care role or customer service role. A valid license to sell health and life insurance in the State of Wisconsin or obtain within 90 days of hire and maintain for the duration of employment. Applicable training certifications to sell Medicare and Individual Family health plans as determined by SHP within 120 days of hire. Strongly prefer an Associate degree & 2 years of experience in health insurance industry. Apply online at: https://marshfieldclinichealthsystems.wd5.myworkdayjobs.com/External/job/Marshfield-WI/SHP-Consumer-Sales-Associate--Remote-_R-0026141 INSTAGRAM.COM Todays Healthcare Jobs Visit Instagram profile

Todays Healthcare Jobs Sponsored CNA Class (CNA Pre-Certification) Marshfield Medical Center - Beaver Dam will be hosting a CNA Class starting on Mon. 2/20 (Registration Deadline: Fri. 2/3) or Mon. 3/20 (Registration Deadline: Fri. 3/3). $500 bonus upon completion of the course and passing of the Wisconsin competency exam. One year commitment to Marshfield Clinic Health System. Must be at least 18 years old or turning 18 within the next 30 days to enroll in the CNA class. Register online at: https://marshfieldclinic.org/careers INSTAGRAM.COM Todays Healthcare Jobs Visit Instagram profile
